content.title: Mapping the Recipients
content.body:
• From the left pane expand TextField - tbxLastName and select text {string}.
    From the right pane select LastName {string}.
  • From the left pane expand TextField - tbxNickName and select text {string}.
    From the right pane select NickName{string}.
  • From the left pane expand TextField - tbxPhone and select text {string}.
    From the right pane select Phone{string}.
